about_the_game:
You awaken in the Somber Sepulchre, utterly alone and bereft of purpose. To find your Lost Resolve, you must venture deep within the Forlorn Dream. You will search the very depths of loneliness and sorrow, that you might once again find hope.

Game Features
  • A variety of movement abilities that flow together seamlessly
  • Beautiful worlds to run through and lose yourself in
  • Challenging time trials
  • An emotive and nostalgic original soundtrack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 512MB VRAM or higher

short_description: Fast, fluid movement is at the core of this vibrant indie adventure. Blast through beautiful landscapes and complete speed challenges to find your purpose in this picturesque, pixelated world.
